description:
This course is a series of lectures and scripts covering a simple to implement six step process for turning fitness leads into paying clients. The information is presented in a straight forward, step-based manner that gives you actionable steps to implement it into your own business conversations as a ready-to-go system.

This course is appropriate for all levels, Beginner to Advanced, and intended for those who want or need help in establishing an effective method for handling the Lead to Client conversation.

At the end you will learn how to turn "selling" into "problem solving", how to Identify the core needs of fitness clients and speak to them effectively, how to target the correct market for your fitness product, and avoid wasted consultations, how to Increase your sales effectiveness by 100%, and how to communicate Value, rather than Price.
title: SALES: How I doubled my Personal Training sales in 30 days
